content: **knitted baby blanket in garter st with stripes worked from corner to corner in drops babymerino** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ babydrops 25-1 drops design pattern no bm-062-by yarn group a ----------------------------------------------------------- **measurements ** small blanket fits premature approx 13½ x 20 34 x 51 cm large blanket stroller blanket approx 20 x 30 50 x 75 cm **materials** drops baby merino from garnstudio 100-150 g color no 28 light mint 100-100 g color no 02 off white or 100-150 g colour no 05 light pink 100-100 g colour no 02 off white drops circular needle 80 cm / 32 size 4 5 mm/ us 7 or size needed to get 20 sts x 39 row in garter st = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm drops crochet hook size 4 mm / g/6 - for edge
